"Cristobal": "It's no small feat to survive in a place like this."
"Everyone's gotta pull together and cooperate."
"Welcome to the Kvaris vanguard camp. I'm the leader of the force, Christobal."
"We've received word of your arrival. We don't have much to offer, but feel free to use our facilities."
"Though there is something I'd like you to take care of, if you have the time."
"Would you be willing to help?"
"If we let these dangerous monsters roam free, there's no telling what might happen."
"If you happen to come across any, please take them down quickly."
"I see... Well, you're still welcome to rest here if you wish. Don't worry, I won't kick you out or anything."
"You work fast. I can tell you're one hell of an ARKS."
"Our investigation team's made of up members from both Aelio and Retem."
"It was put together in kind of a hurry, so we're always short on hands around here."
"With an ARKS like you around, we might actually be able to get some work done."
"If you see anyone from my squad who needs a hand, do you think you could help them out?"
"There's still so much about this place we don't know. Why don't we scratch each other's backs?"
"Like I said earlier, the camp's always open. You're free to make use of anything you need."
"I look forward to working with you again."
"Hey, how's it going? Gotten used to things here in Kvaris?"
"Our investigation is proceeding smoothly. Hey, why don't you join in as well?"
"Could be a good change of pace to approach Kvaris from a different perspective for once."
"This is a great opportunity to learn all about our mission."
"You might only be gathering items, but it's not as easy as you think. You'll have to show me exactly what you're capable of."
"I've sent the coordinates and quantities of the items to your Mag. Good luck."
"Guess you're busy. Next time you're free, give me a call."
